ok.. first find the inode number of the file like.. ls -il /etc/hosts.. once you get the number then use the debugfs command "stat" to display the contents of the inode.. you'd type "stat <inode_number>"
before issuing the stat command you have to "debugfs" first then "stat <number>".. when done "quit" to get out of debugfs
